event.name: PACT_BENEFACTOR
event.text: You appear right above a small shack, there seems to be a small figure down below.
You approach the figure and realize his face has a seemingly unmoving smile as he waits for you to walk up to him.

choice.text: Go up to the smiling man.

event.text: You approach the figure. He spoke, "Welcome, I was hoping to become your benefactor." His smile seemed to expand even more.

The figure shakes your hand and his hand transforms into black gunk which tears into your skin and marks it. "I will be watching over you." You return to your ship unsure of how to feel about this development.

The man's smile twists into a scowl. "I don't think you realize, you don't have a choice anymore." Your ship explodes behind you as the figure changes into a black mass of crawling chaos as he consumes your crew.

choice.text: Can't swear due to being in another pact.

event.text: The figure looked at you curiously, "Then why come here? Perhaps I could help you with that pact that is such a problem." Suddenly you hear your ship ripped apart and then put back together. You look at your ship and back at the figure. "No need to thank me." He reached in and whispered, "I'll be watching." He disappeared into his shack.
